jd: From: Sameer, GSK Solutions Inc sameer@gsksolutions.com Reply to: sameer@gsksolutions.com Job ID: 135545Client: State of MichiganJob Title: Business Analyst (Hybrid)Location: Lansing, MIDuration:12 MonthsPay Rate: $50/hr on C2C / 1099 All Inclusive - Close to Submissions on: 10/7 10AM EST.- Interviews: 1st round interviews will be held via MS Teams. 2nd round interviews will likely be held in person, so candidates should be available for an in-person interview.- Position location: Lansing, MI. Resource will be working a hybrid schedule. NO REMOTE ONLY OPTION. Will need to be onsite from day 1, two days a week (Tuesdays and Wednesdays).- Local candidates (strongly preferred) or non-local candidates who are willing to relocate and follow the hybrid work schedule from day 1 may be submitted. Clear and concise communication skills required. Top Skills & Years of Experience Required:- Experience with Azure DevOps (minimum of 6 months)- Experience in a role, as a business analyst, supporting a software development project, in the past 5 years (minimum of 3 years)- Ability to conduct meetings, communicate at a level appropriate to the audience, make oral and written reports and presentations (minimum of 3 years) Full Job Description:We are looking for someone who understands and has experience with the software development lifecycle as they will be managing work requests to support operational support needs for web applications and gather requirements for project initiatives. This role is the liaison between the technical team and the business client. This will be about 90% of the time for this resource.Tasks:Facilitates meetings with the technical team and business client.Gathers requirements and project specifications by leading requirement sessions independentlyMaintain backlog of work items in Azure DevOpsManage project tasks, timelines, and communication between business product owner and development team associated with the Change Management lifecycleTrack sprints and ticket progress in Azure DevOpsEnsures the team is adhering to the department change management policiesActs as a liaison with State of Michigan auditorsMaintains documentation on the project SharePoint Site.Must be detail oriented and a critical thinkerProvide management with information such as project status reports and resource demand projections. SkillRequired / DesiredRequired Years of experienceExposure to Complex IT web Applications, within the past 5 yearsRequired5 YearsExperience in a professional office environmentRequired5 YearsExperience in a role, as a business analyst, supporting a software development project, in the past 5 yearsRequired3 YearsAbility to conduct meetings, communicate at a level appropriate to the audience, make oral and written reports and presentationsRequired3 YearsProficiency with MS OfficeRequired3 YearsExperience working as a liaison between the development team and project manager or business client in a software development projectRequired2 YearsExperience with Azure DevOpsRequired6 MonthsKnowledge and understanding of the Software Development LifecycleHighly Desired2 YearsProject management skills and knowledge in project management and related methodologiesHighly Desired6 MonthsExperience with Microsoft SharePointHighly Desired6 Months
